scratch-confirmaccount-desc: Request and confirm accounts linked to Scratch
scratch-confirmaccount-vercode-explanati: Please go to the [$1 user verification project] and comment the code below
scratch-confirmaccount-checkbox-agree: I agree to the Terms of Service
scratch-confirmaccount-norequests: There are no requests to view.
scratch-confirmaccount-already-accepted: You cannot handle requests that are already accepted.
scratch-confirmaccount-reqfeedback-done: Request marked as request further feedback.
scratch-confirmaccount-invalid-username: The username is invalid. Make sure to type your Scratch username. Due to technical reasons, some usernames which include underscore are not allowed.
scratch-confirmaccount-request-exists: The request is already received. Please wait for the administrators to handle it.
scratch-confirmaccount-verif-missing: Please comment the verification code while logged into Scratch account '$1'.
scratch-confirmaccount-user-blocked: You are not allowed to request an account. Reason: $1
scratch-confirmaccount-disagree-tos: You have to agree to the Terms of Service to request an account.
scratch-confirmaccount-success: Account request has been received. Administrators will handle it and send response.
